title: Dow surges above 50,000 for the first time as US stocks regain mojo
description: The Dow surged above 50,000 points for the first time Friday, shrugging off worries connected to artificial intelligence companies while traders focused on the prospects for US growth and Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. Earlier milestones for the Dow include when it hit 40,000 points in May 2024 and 30,000 points in November 2020.
content:

title: SpaceX delays Mars plans to focus on 2027 moon landing: Report

title: Tax breaks for foreign data centres only if guardrails are put in place
description: This is a situation where a country hosts the physical machinery of artificial intelligence—the land, the power, the water, and the data centres—but does not own the intelligence those machines produce | Mumbai news
content: But this logic begins to unravel once data in the AI world is understood not as “software”, but infrastructure. It is not merely a warehouse of computers, but an industrial facility designed to convert electricity and water into intelligence. Unlike ... [4511 chars]

title: Denver’s Angi Inc. cuts 350 jobs amid AI-driven efficiency push
description: Angi Inc., a Denver-based home services company, announced it has cut about 350 employees globally as it restructures operations and leans on artificial intelligence to improve efficiency.
